Getterã¯Gettingã®ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–

ã€€ã¾ãšã¯å®šç¾©ã‚’ã°ã€‚

type Getting r s a = (a -> Const r a) -> s -> Const r s
type Getter s a = forall f. (Contravariant f, Functor f) => (a -> f a) -> s -> f s
  • Control.Lens.Getter (Getter)
  • Control.Lens.Getter (Getting)

ã€€GettingãŒGetterã®fã‚’ï¼ˆrã‚’å¤–ã«é€ƒã—ã¦ï¼‰Const rã«å›ºå®šã—ãŸå‹ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

(ç°¡ç•¥) Getting :: (a -> Const r a) -> s -> Const r s
(ç°¡ç•¥) Getter  :: (a -> f       a) -> s -> f       s

ã€€Const rã¯ContravariantFunctor Functorãªã®ã§ã€fã«å½“ã¦ã¯ã¾ã‚‹ã€‚

instance Contravariant (Const a)
instance Functor (Const a)

ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã¯Getterã¯Gettingã®ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

Setterã¯Settingã®ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–

ã€€å®šç¾©ã¯ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

type Setting p s t a b = p a (Identity b) -> s -> Identity t
type Setter s t a b = forall f. Settable f => (a -> f b) -> s -> f t

Settingã¯Gettingã¨1ã¤ã ã‘é•ã£ã¦ã€(->)ãŒpã«ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ pã‚’(->)ã«ç‰¹æ®ŠåŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€Gettingã®Const rã‚’Identityã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆãŸå‹ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚

type Setting p s t a b = p    a (Identity b) -> s -> Identity t
(ç‰¹æ®ŠåŒ–)             ==> (->) a (Identity b) -> s -> Identity t
(ç°¡ç´„)               ==> (a ->   Identity b) -> s -> Identity t

ã€€Settableã¯ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§

class (Applicative f, Distributive f, Traversable f) => Settable f where
  untainted :: f a -> a
  untaintedDot :: Profunctor p => p a (f b) -> p a b
  taintedDot :: Profunctor p => p a b -> p a (f b)

Settableã¯Applicative Distributive Traversable (functor) ã ã¨è§£é‡ˆã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

type Setter s t a b = forall f. (Applicative f, Distributive f, Traversable f) => (a -> f b) -> s -> f t

ã€€(->)ã¯pã§ã€

data (->) :: * -> * -> *

Identityã¯Applicative Distributive Traversableãªã®ã§

instance Applicative Identity
instance Distributive Identity
instance Traversable Identity

Anything Settable must be isomorphic to the Identity Functor.
